name: places/ChIJlfOljAVZwokRlTf9zR0itcA
formattedAddress: 420 E 51st St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 420 E 51st St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: My wife and I booked parking for the day online 1 day prior. We both arrived in the morning at 10am, met the attendant Angel who was very kind and left the car with him. Later on when we returned, the car was brought to us and again Angel was very pleasant and we gave him a tip in which he was very appreciative. I would highly recommend this location for parking when in this neighborhood. It is a very safe location and they provided very good service. Note that we came with a Toyota Camry. If you drive an oversize Suburban LTZ or some other monstrosity,  it might be a squeeze but if you can afford a car that size, then you can afford a driver instead of parking.

I parked my car here last night and I supposed to pickup at 12:30am when i went to the garage the garage was closed, i called the office and they told me to wait till tomorrow 6am when we open because we close at 11pm last night They charge me even for all those hours i was waiting to pickup the car outside in the street they closed the fkn garage at 11pm and they told me nothing!
